channel.title: N33d Coders!
channel.description: Hey guys, this is the owner of MinimiScape. My server is getting boring because not a lot of updates and i'm not willing to quit because I don't give up. But i'm busy and getting bored of my server myself. So i'm looking for someone to help me and code. And you [b]MUST[/b] know how to code. At least know how to make/edit shops. Make NPC's talk, put NPC's where you want them, and make commands, then you're a coder. Just message me if you wish to become a coder. With all hope: Proud owner of MinimiScape

item.title: N33d Coders!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

You shouldn’t have a server if you can’t code :s
Just think, if you can, until you think of something kewl,
Then make it?

Read full topic

item.title: N33d Coders!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I don’t see why people ‘need coders’. You should be able to do your yourself. If you can’t, then play servers belonging to other people or alternatively click the link to the Java tutorials in my sig.

On another note, commands, shops, and NPCs DO NOT make a good server.

Read full topic

oh and i can do all of what you said. ( spite my name im a good coder )

item.title: N33d Coders!

Hey guys, this is the owner of MinimiScape. My server is getting boring because not a lot of updates and i’m not willing to quit because I don’t give up. Make NPC’s talk, put NPC’s where you want them, and make commands, then you’re a coder. Just message me if you wish to become a coder.
With all hope: Proud owner of MinimiScape
